page.title: 12GOVERNMENT IN AYLESBURY
page.content: BUCK'S COUNTY: The population is about 600,000.Its area is 188,281 hectares. {Buckingham} has a mayor, Aylesbury does not. There are 11,500 council houses. RECREATION: There are 3 swimming pools, parks, and sports fields. HEALTH: For health there is a meat inspection and food hygiene. There is also a refuse collection and the refuse disposal is covered by {Buck's C.C.} ELECTIONS: There are 58 councillors, 2 Parliamentary Constituencies and an E.E.C. Constituency. PARISHES: There are 79 parish councils and 31 parish meetings. {YOUTH TRAINING} CENTRE: This scheme is for school leavers who feel they need extra training. The subjects are figures, communication problems, and pratical skills.
